name: lichtara-os
description: The Future of Conscious Technology Integration - A platform bridging spiritual wisdom and cutting-edge technology

scripts.install:prototypes: npm run install:v1 && npm run install:v2
scripts.status: npm run status:v1 && npm run status:v2
scripts.status:v1: echo '=== Prototype v1 (05_Prototipo) Status ===' && cd 05-prototipos/05-prototipo/05_Prototipo && (ls node_modules > /dev/null 2>&1 && echo '✓ Dependencies installed' || echo '✗ Dependencies not installed - run npm run install:prototypes') && echo 'Package info:' && npm list --depth=0 2>/dev/null | head -5
scripts.status:v2: echo '=== Prototype v2 (5.1_Prototipo) Status ===' && cd 05-prototipos/05-prototipo/5.1_Prototipo && (ls node_modules > /dev/null 2>&1 && echo '✓ Dependencies installed' || echo '✗ Dependencies not installed - run npm run install:prototypes') && echo 'Package info:' && npm list --depth=0 2>/dev/null | head -5

author: Lichtara OS Team
